resources.string: QRscanner Would like to access the Camera
This allows QR scanner to let you click pictures to share. Click to setting to enable.
QR scanner Would like to access the Storage
This allows QR scanner to let access your storage. Click to setting to enable.
QR Would like to access the Call
This allows QR to let you call . Click to setting to enable.
QR scanner Would like to access the contacts
This allows QR scanner to let access your contacts. Click to setting to enable.
QRscanner Would like to access the Calendar
This allows QR scanner to let access calendar. Click to setting to enable.
